attributes.action: Allow atleast one serious fault that is not a big deal in driving test
attributes.background: I have failed so many driving test because of one serious fault, it is costing me too much as theyre only minor serious such as causing someone to overtake or not checking mirror however i drive really good generally

rejection.details:
The content of driving test is the responsibility of the Driver and Vehicle Standards Agency (DVSA). 

You can find out how to contact them here: 

https://www.gov.uk/contact-dvsa
